page.title: 05The Wragby Calendar
page.content: The first big event in Wragby every year is a{pancake race}on Shrove Tuesday.The schoolchildren have races carrying pancakes in pans and tossing them.The mums also have a go. At different times of the year, Wragby { {drama group,}called Wragby Players,produce a play or musical.The first is usually around Easter and this year we did "The Sound of Music". {Gala Day}comes next.At this,lots of organisations like the Swimming Club, Bowling Club and Playgroup enter different games and competitions. These include rifle shooting,flower arranging,painting and rounders and points are given. The group with the most points wins.It is fun.
